de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.loader.simple

Class DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.loader.simple.DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationFileChangeMonitor

    public class DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor
extends Object
implements ConfigurationFileChangeMonitor
    Default file change monitor, that watches a file for changes or deletion and notifies change handlers about these events. It checks the file in a regular timed interval.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor.FileChecker
      Runnable to check a files for changes.

      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a file change monitor for the given file with default values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor

        public DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor(File file)
        Creates a file change monitor for the given file with default values.
        • Check interval: 5 sec
        • Check type: last modification time
        Parameters:
        file - the file to monitor

      • DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor

        public DefaultConfigurationFileChangeMonitor(File file,
                                     long interval,
                                     boolean improved)
        Creates a file change monitor for the given file based on the given values.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to monitor
        interval - the check interval
        improved - if true a hash sum is used to monitor the file instead of the last modification time
